summary: Diff adds a LiveMarketplacePreview component with in-file placeholder marketplace items and refactors ForgeHomePage to use three useSectionEntryMotion hooks and a hero section with max-w-5xl, py-16 md:py-20, a single H1 containing “Capability Marketplace”, and an in-hero trust/credibility bullet row. However, the diff summary is truncated before showing the full CTA set, Section 2 accordion content/ARIA behavior, and Section 3 layout + final CTA implementation details, so several requirements cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero must include two primary CTAs ("Explore Agents" and "Enter Marketplace") and two secondary CTAs ("Build Agent" and "Start Building").
missing_requirements.reason: The ForgeHomePage.tsx diff is truncated before the Button labels/secondary CTAs are visible, so the required CTA set and exact labels cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Section 2 must be a compact "How Forge Works" accordion with exactly three items: Agent Discovery, Workflow Orchestration, Trust + Settlement; container max-w-4xl and py-14 md:py-16; keyboard + ARIA correctness.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided ForgeHomePage.tsx snippet shows Accordion imports but is truncated before Section 2 markup/content and spacing classes, so the exact three items, layout rules, and ARIA/keyboard behavior cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Section 3 must be a merged "Live marketplace" preview + visually dominant final CTA with label "Enter Marketplace" or "Start Using Forge" or "Launch Your Agent"; uses max-w-6xl and py-14 md:py-16; includes live-ecosystem framing copy; CTA navigates to an appropriate existing route (e.g., /marketplace).
missing_requirements.reason: LiveMarketplacePreview placeholder data is present, but ForgeHomePage.tsx is truncated before Section 3 wrapper, spacing/max-width classes, framing copy, and final CTA label/route can be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply global spacing/container rules: non-hero sections use py-14 md:py-16 (no py-20 md:py-28); Section 2 max-w-4xl; Section 3 max-w-6xl.
missing_requirements.reason: Hero spacing/max-width is visible, but the diff is truncated before Section 2 and Section 3 containers, so their spacing/max-width (and absence of py-20 md:py-28) cannot be validated from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Respect prefers-reduced-motion so sections render without requiring intersection entry to become visible.
missing_requirements.reason: ForgeHomePage.tsx shows three useSectionEntryMotion hooks, but the truncated diff does not show any prefers-reduced-motion handling (either via the hook implementation or CSS overrides), so compliance cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use relative imports in ForgeHomePage.tsx (including for shadcn accordion components) unless aliases are guaranteed.
missing_requirements.reason: Relative imports are shown for ui/accordion and other imports in ForgeHomePage.tsx, but the diff is truncated and does not show the entire file; cannot conclusively verify no alias imports appear later in the file.
